definitions.definition: a (type of) film, play, or book that is intentionally funny either in its characters or its action:
examples: His latest movie is described as a "romantic comedy".

definitions.definition: the humorous part of a situation:
examples: The vicar's forgetting his lines in the middle of the speech provided some good comedy.

definitions.definition: a type of comedy in which the social behaviour of a particular group of people is made to appear silly
